english: We deal in hardware but not software .
chinese: 我们只经营硬件而不经营软件。

english: Her talk ran on developments in computer software .
chinese: 她谈的是计算机软件的开发问题。

english: The software enforcement of priorities has been described above .
chinese: 上面已叙述了用软件执行优先权。

english: Not everyone enjoys writing the software required for keyboard encoding .
chinese: 并不是人人都喜欢编写键盘所需的软件。

english: Future computer development depends in large part upon software .
chinese: 未来的电子计算机的发展，在很大程度上决定于软件。
软件造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: In this machine which items make up the software and the hardware respectively ?
chinese: 在机器中，哪几项分别构成软件和硬件？

english: Eoc can also activate an interrupt input, depending on the software considerations .
chinese: 根据软件的情况，EOC信号也能够使一个中断输入动作。

english: Some teachers enthusiastically espouse the benefits to be gained from educational software .
chinese: 有些教师热烈赞同可以从教学软件中得到好处的观点。

english: Soft-sectoring refers to the fact that the division of the disk or track into sectors is performed by software .
chinese: 软分段是指用软件来把磁盘或磁道划分成磁段的情况。

english: The report, we fear, may have the effect of causing some people to think twice about securing abc software .
chinese: 我们担心这个报道会使得某些人在购买ABC软件时考虑再三。

english: A second method, software-driven, but with the help of some additional hardware, is significantly faster .
chinese: 第二种方法是软件驱动，但需要一些附加硬件。这种方法速度快得多。

english: To some it is virtually equivalent to data processing and is tied inextricably to computer software .
chinese: 有一些最终事实上就等于资料处理，并且不可避免地要和计算机的软件相结合。

english: The hardware advances must be matched by suitable software before their application is possible .
chinese: 计算机硬件技术的发展必须有软件技术的发展予以配合，否则硬件的发明是无法应用的。

english: On the more modern systems most of the logic is in the form of software fed into and stored in the internal memory .
chinese: 在更多现代系统中，逻辑大部分以软件形式出现，输入和存贮在内存贮器中。

english: Computers are gradually overcoming such obstacles as the shortage of courseware and prohibitive school system budgets .
chinese: 计算机的使用正在逐步克服教学软件短缺，学校建立计算机系统资金有限等一些碍障。
